title: WhatsApp Link Generator
description: Generate WhatsApp links easily to start conversations with specific numbers and predefined messages.

form.phoneHelp: Enter the number with area code (ex: 1234567890) or with country code (+1234567890)
form.messagePlaceholder: Ex: Hello! I would like to know more about...
form.messageHelp: The message will appear automatically when the link is opened

alerts.phoneRequired: Please enter a valid phone number

about.title: About WhatsApp Link Generator
about.description: This tool allows you to create personalized WhatsApp links that open directly to a conversation with a specific number. You can include a predefined message that will be displayed automatically when the link is clicked.

tips.title: Usage Tips
tips.worksMobile: Works on both mobile and computer

note.title: Important
note.content: Generated links work on any device with WhatsApp installed. On computer, it will open WhatsApp Web if logged in.
